settings.heading: About this Brand
settings.text: InsOpaint provides high quality paint that doesn't only colour but protect and insulates-the only genuine energy-efficient, durable, and environmentally friendly painting solutions on the market that enhance the comfort, beauty, and sustainability of your home.

settings.title: Water Repellent Silicone Coating
settings.text: InsOpaint Clear forms a heavy-duty silicone seal, akin to those on iconic structures like the White House, effectively repelling water, dirt, and chemicals.

settings.title: Deep Penetration
settings.text: This clear coat penetrates up to 17mm into surfaces, providing unparalleled waterproofing and weather protection for bricks, concrete, stucco, and more.

settings.title: Micro-Porous Breathability
settings.text: Engineered with micro-porous structures, it allows water vapours to escape while preventing moisture ingress, ensuring optimal breathability.

settings.title: Colour and Texture Preservation
settings.text: Unlike tinted coatings, InsOpaint Clear maintains the original colour and texture of surfaces, preserving their aesthetic appeal.

settings.title: Guaranteed Durability
settings.text: Backed by a 10-year guarantee, this masonry paint eliminates efflorescence, spalling, and cracking, while resisting acids, alkalis, and salt spray.

settings.title: Aesthetic Preservation
settings.text: Preserves surface colour and texture.

settings.title: All-Weather Shield
settings.text: Guards against water, dirt, chemicals, and extreme weather conditions.

settings.title: Breathable Barrier
settings.text: Promotes breathability, allowing moisture to escape.

settings.title: Property Value Boost
settings.text: Increases property value by enhancing the Energy Performance Certificate (EPC).

settings.heading: Additives
settings.text: Our state-of-the-art additives are designed to provide a wealth of benefits: they enhance paint durability, combat mould, and, unique to InsOpaint, offer insulating properties that help reduce energy costs.

settings.heading: Pigment
settings.text: The finest-grade pigments in InsOpaint ensure your colours remain vibrant and true, bringing a luxurious and enduring appeal to any space.

settings.heading: Resin
settings.text: InsOpaint's high-grade resins provide a breathable and waterproof barrier, enhancing the paint's ability to cover flawlessly while resisting mould and weathering, ensuring your finish stays pristine longer.

settings.heading: INGREDIENTS
settings.text: InsOpaint delivers high-grade paint solutions without the premium price tag. Our products are crafted with the highest quality materials, ensuring a cost-effective, energy-saving, and long-lasting finish.

settings.heading: How InsOpaint Masonry Protection Cream Works
PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

settings.heading: PAINT
settings.text: Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray

Energy-Efficient Innovation

settings.heading: Energy Bill Reduction
settings.text: InsOpaint's products are scientifically proven to save on energy bills by reducing heat loss, delivering a noticeable impact on your energy consumption.

settings.heading: Advanced Breathability
settings.text: The unique breathability of InsOpaint ensures a reduction in condensation problems, maintaining the integrity of your walls and ceilings.

settings.heading: Durable Insulation
settings.text: Designed to be durable, InsOpaint offers a protective layer that keeps rooms at a comfortable temperature for longer, providing a lasting insulative effect.
Eco-Friendly and Effective

settings.heading: Environmentally Friendly
settings.text: InsOpaint commits to environmental stewardship with low VOC levels and eco-friendly ingredients, aligning with sustainable home and property practices.

settings.heading: Scientifically Proven
settings.text: Each product in the InsOpaint range has been independently tested, ensuring effectiveness in insulating and energy-saving capabilities.

settings.heading: Versatile Applications
settings.text: Suitable for a wide range of settings, InsOpaint can be Utilised in residential, commercial, and industrial environments, adapting to various insulating needs.

settings.heading: Thermilate Expertise
settings.text: With over a decade of expertise, Thermilate Technologies provides reliable, proven products that have been trusted globally for their insulating properties.

settings.text: InsOpaint stands out as the world's premier provider of insulating paints, coatings, and plasters, offering a suite of products that go beyond mere aesthetics.
